title: Pretty princess sion.
body:
Because nothing shows how male you are like wearing a dress and still look manly.

UPDATE:

Now I added a tiara which says: 'princess' and a star fairy brand to feel ever so manly!
It took me a while to decide the details but I am glad with the results. Much photoshop skillz.{{summoner:3}}

replies.body:
"wat"

-exactly what I said
Hello, nightmares.

10/10 would buy, and I don't even play sion.

Enjoy the whimsical magic of Pretty princess sion :)

NB: I have been asked to add a tiara... I did but I though after: He already has one around his jaw. {{champion:59}}  kek.

how about french maid Sion.
